content: तर A Taddhita affix of the comparative degree, added to adjectives, nouns, and also to verbs and indeclinables in which latter case it is changed to तराम्. It is added, like तम, to pronouns in the sense of ‘one of two,’ {%<ab>e. g.</ab>%} कतर, ततर, यतर &c.
तर, तरण, तरणि, तरंड, तरि-री, तरीष &c. See under तॄ.

तर {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [तॄ-भवे-अप्] {@--1@} Crossing. {@--2@} Surpassing, excelling. {@--3@} Conquering, overpowering; <ab>cf.</ab> दुस्तर. --रः {@--1@} Passing over, crossing, passage; <ls>Bk. 7. 55.</ls> {@--2@} Freight; दीर्घाध्वनि यथादेशं यथाकालं तरो भवेत् <ls>Ms. 8. 406.</ls> {@--3@} A road. {@--4@} A ferry-boat. {@--5@} Fire.
